content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the case involved two parties and was concluded on may 22 2023 the defendant had to pay €6728 in court fees while the plaintiff had to pay €76500 in professional fees the case was about the division of matrimonial property which included various buildings vehicles and a credit agreement the defendant objected to the assets claimed by the plaintiff and proposed a method for dividing the credit obligations and compensation to protect the interests of a minor child the court awarded the plaintiff a larger share of the property and the defendant received financial compensation the court also established contact arrangements between the parents regarding their daughter and ordered the father to pay monthly maintenance the court awarded specific properties to each party and modified the credit agreement the court considered a report from the child protection authority and concluded that the action is allowed in full finally the court granted the divorce and dissolved the marriage

metadata.cost: 67.28 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant; 765.00 EUR (proffesional fees) to be borne by the plaintiff;
